EmailTemplate.description: DNBI Credit Information Update for Account
EmailTemplate.name: DNBI Credit Information Update for Account
EmailTemplate.subject: Credit Application Status Update for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A Credit Decision has been updated on {!Account.Name} for credit application {!Account.DNBI__DnB_Application_ID__c}. Please review the updated credit decision.Click to view the record.. Note: You can search the credit application ID in the main search box on Salesforce.com
